verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: took] [ARG2: to Twitter] [ARGM-TMP: this weekend] , but it wasn 's his usual rant . This time the president complained that smartphone giant ZTE was losing " too many jobs in China " as a result of U.S. sanctions .
